mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop ( shop_uuid, shop_type, shop_name, shop_ceo, shop_bs_code, shop_zonecode, shop_addr1, shop_addr2, shop_tel, shop_content, shop_created_date ) VALUES ( #{shop_uuid}, #{shop_type}, #{shop_name}, #{shop_ceo}, #{shop_bs_code}, #{shop_zonecode}, #{shop_addr1}, #{shop_addr2}, #{shop_tel}, #{shop_content}, SYSDATE() )
